title: What are some facts about the Nazca lines? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is an unusual formation of a white line that you can see if you travel in the desert of southern Peru. It is a famous UNESCO World Heritage Site and in ancient strange forms comes triangles, rectangles, detours and tripods. If you look closely you will see 300 geometric shapes, plant structures and 70 animals. The structure of these lines has not yet been known, but according to archaeologists, the Nazca Indians erected critical lines somewhere between 500 BC and 750 AD.
